section.heading: Accessibility.
section.text: An ALR that provides services for residents who use wheelchairs, shall insure that:

para.text: Doorways and hallways provide a clear opening of at least 32 inches; and
Thresholds exceeding 1/2 inch are modified to provide a 1:12 maximum slope.

annotations.annotation: The 2012 amendment by D.C. Law 19-169 substituted “residents who use wheelchairs” for “wheelchair-bound residents” in the introductory language.
Section 35 of D.C. Law 19-169 provided that no provision of the act shall impair any right or obligation existing under law.
